Ogwu Ayrton Manufacturing Limited bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-eme ọgwụ nke ndi Ghana

E depụtara ụlọ ọrụ azụmaahịa ahụ na ndepụta ngwaahịa nke Ghana Stock Exchange, GSE All-Share Index.
Ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe ọ rụrụ dabeere na Tesano, nke dị na Accra
Pọtụfoliyo ngwaahịa nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gụnyere ọgwụ mgbochi hypertensive, hematinics, nkwadebe dermatological, ọgwụ nje, dewormers, ndị na-egbu mgbu na ọgwụ mgbochi mkpali
Na February 2010 Adcock Ingram, ụlọ ọrụ ọgwụ South Africa nwetara 66% mbak na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ.
Na Na Jenụwarị 2020, Ayrton Drug Manufacturing Limited na ụlọ ọrụ abụọ ndị ọzọ na-emepụta ọgwụ ụlọ, Dannex Limited na Starwin Products Limited, ejikọtalarị ma depụta ya na GSE dị ka DAS Pharma.
